long_description: The Island Boost Endurance Fuel drink provides essential carbs, naturally occurring electrolytes and a light, sweet flavor to keep you pushing during high-endurance activity. Island Boost Endurance Fuel rushes energy into the bloodstream and quickly fuels hard-working muscles using glucose and fructose. Similar in sweetness to a sorbet or slushee drink, there is no need to wash down Endurance Fuel with a bottle of water. Because it's an easy-to-digest liquid rather than gel, it's great for those who have stomach issues during strenuous activity. Vegan and gluten free. Island Boost suggests freezing packets for an extra cool treat on a hot day. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Island Boost Endurance Fuel drink provides essential carbs, naturally occurring electrolytes and a light, sweet flavor to keep you pushing during high-endurance activity.
